description: A vulnerability was found in Tenda AC10U 15.03.06.49_multi_TDE01 and classified as critical. This issue affects the function formWifiWpsOOB. The manipulation of the argument index leads to stack-based buffer overflow. The attack may be initiated remotely. The exploit has been disclosed to the public and may be used. The associated identifier of this vulnerability is VDB-252131. NOTE: The vendor was contacted early about this disclosure but did not respond in any way.
